commit.message: Add implementation of ZeroclickfraudBidder and tests

nodes.bodyText: make {{Host}} and {{SourceId}} constants in the class
I'd prefer split entry into variables in the method signature
Where checks for  StatusBadReques and not Ok statuses
validate url will fail on the real endpoint ("http://{{Host}}/openrtb2?sid={{SourceId}}")

I meant that this test is happy path.
Add test which will show the real endpoint. (use ENDPOINT_TEMPLATE)
